background_context.situation: Reviewing the mobile rendering of the Santa Barbara Newcomers website.
background_context.environment: Non-profit club website focused on social integration and community activities.
background_context.constraints: Inconsistencies in member counts and event listings; need for improved user interface.

goals_motivations.drives_them: Desire for a visually appealing and functional website that effectively communicates the club's offerings.
goals_motivations.what_they_are_trying_to_achieve: To improve user experience and conversion rates for prospective members.

behaviors_patterns.current_work: Conducting a detailed review of the website structure and content.
behaviors_patterns.habits: Identifying issues and suggesting improvements based on usability principles.

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Inconsistent information on different pages, lack of clear call-to-action, and visually unpleasing design.
pain_points_frustrations.what_doesnt_work_well: Navigation difficulties and mixed messaging for prospective members.

needs_desires.what_would_make_life_better: A streamlined website with clear, consistent information and easy navigation.
needs_desires.what_they_are_looking_for: More effective ways to convert visitors into members through improved content and layout.

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Believes in the importance of clear communication and user-friendly design.
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Prefers direct and efficient navigation with a focus on prospective member experience.
attitudes_beliefs.values: Values transparency and accuracy in information presented.

technical_comfort.tools_used: Website navigation and usability testing tools.
technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Comfortable with website analysis and suggesting changes.
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Learns best through hands-on experience and user feedback.

quotes: This homepage here just needs a lot of work.
We should actually put that Join Us button at the bottom after people read about us.
It seems we got upcoming public events here. That's a great place.
Visually, it's not pleasing. But more importantly, I've got to click into a lot of different things to get information.
